Package com.gsma.mobileconnect.oidc

Interface for the Mobile Connect OpenID Connect SDK.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IOIDC
    Interface of Mobile Connect SDK
    IParseAuthenticationResponseCallback
    Interface to capture the IOIDC.parseAuthenticationResponse(String, IParseAuthenticationResponseCallback) response.
    IParseIDTokenCallback
    Interface to capture the IOIDC.parseIDToken(DiscoveryResponse, String, TokenOptions, IParseIDTokenCallback) response.
    IRequestTokenCallback
    Interface to capture the IOIDC.requestToken(DiscoveryResponse, String, String, TokenOptions, IRequestTokenCallback) response.
    IStartAuthenticationCallback
    Interface to capture the IOIDC.startAuthentication(DiscoveryResponse, String, String, String, String, Integer, String, String, AuthenticationOptions, IStartAuthenticationCallback) response.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationOptions  
    ParsedAuthorizationResponse
    Class to hold the response from IOIDC.parseAuthenticationResponse(String, IParseAuthenticationResponseCallback).
    ParsedIdToken
    Class to hold the details parsed from an id_token.
    RequestTokenResponse
    Class to hold the response of IOIDC.requestToken(DiscoveryResponse, String, String, TokenOptions, IRequestTokenCallback)
    RequestTokenResponseData
    A class that holds a valid response from IOIDC.requestToken(DiscoveryResponse, String, String, TokenOptions, IRequestTokenCallback).
    StartAuthenticationResponse
    Class to hold the response from IOIDC.startAuthentication(DiscoveryResponse, String, String, String, String, Integer, String, String, AuthenticationOptions, IStartAuthenticationCallback).
    TokenOptions
    Class to hold the optional parameters for the IOIDC.parseIDToken(DiscoveryResponse, String, TokenOptions, IParseIDTokenCallback) and IOIDC.requestToken(DiscoveryResponse, String, String, TokenOptions, IRequestTokenCallback).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DiscoveryResponseExpiredException
    Exception thrown when methods in IOIDC are passed an expired discovery response.
    OIDCException
    Exception thrown by methods in IOIDC.

Package com.gsma.mobileconnect.oidc Description

Interface for the Mobile Connect OpenID Connect SDK.

The main interface is IOIDC, see Factory.getOIDC().
